mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS userId, u.nickname AS nickname, u.avatar AS avatar, u.expert_status AS expertStatus, uf.created_at AS followedAt FROM user_follow uf JOIN user u ON u.id = uf.followee_id WHERE uf.follower_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uf.created_at DESC, uf.id DESC
